name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Foxit PDF Editor Cloud: Edit and Convert

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your productivity and simplify online PDF processing with Foxit's Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the New Foxit PDF Editor Cloud Chrome Extension

Experience effortless in-browser PDF reader and PDF editor capabilities FREE with the Foxit PDF Editor Cloud Chrome extension - so you can create, edit, convert, and annotate PDFs without having to switch applications. This extension is built with speed in mind, so it won’t cause browser lag or cross-team delays.

Foxit PDF Editor Cloud for Chrome: It’s the better, faster, more intelligent PDF viewing experience.

How to Utilize Foxit's PDF Extension:
	1. Install the Foxit extension for Chrome
	2. Pin the extension for quick access
	3. Open any PDF in your browser

Foxit delivers premium PDF capabilities with our unique toolkit featuring:
	• Foxit’s award-winning easy-to-use interface
	• Simple in-browser PDF editing
	• Quick highlighting and annotation
	• Insert, rotate, split, and delete PDF pages
	• Search the contents of a PDF document
	• Click to Convert PDF files
	• Streamlined PDF document workflows
And it’s all free to use.

Combine this free Chrome extension with your Foxit PDF Editor Cloud subscription for even more functionality.
	• Save PDFs directly to your cloud for easy access on any device
	• Collaborate and share files on the cloud
	• Open files directly in your PDF editor as your default viewer
	• Access powerful AI tools
	• Gain access to advanced security features and much more

Terms & Conditions: Your usage of this application is subject to Foxit's General Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, available at Foxit Legal Page https://www.foxit.com/product/foxit-product-terms-of-service.html.
